D

DataMapper - interface de.susebox.jtopas.spi.DataMapper.
This interface declares the methods that a Tokenizer will call to detect the image and type of a token.
DataProvider - interface de.susebox.jtopas.spi.DataProvider.
This interface supplies the nessecary methods for a DataMapper or its subinterfaces (WhitespaceHandler, SeparatorHandler, PatternHandler KeywordHandler and SequenceHandler) to perform its operations like checking for whitespaces, special sequences etc.
